file.name: mollie-headless.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0" info: title: "Mollie Headless API" version: "1.0" description: "This is a Swagger Template for all Headless cases of the Mollie plugin.

Instructions:
  1. Configure the correct server domain, where your Shopware Store API ist available.
  2. Click on Authorize and fill in the Access Key from your Sales Channel.
  3. Then use the Cart request for Shopware to retrieve an Access-Token
  4. Just copy the Access-Token and use it in the global authorize section too.

Congratulations, you can now use the API requests." servers: - url: / - url: https://localhost - url: http://localhost - url: '{custom}' variables: custom: default: https://localhost externalDocs: description: "Find out more about Mollie Shopware" url: "https://github.com/mollie/Shopware6/wiki" paths: /store-api/account/login: post: tags: - "Account" summary: "Login with a customer" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] requestBody: content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: username: default: "" password: default: "" responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/checkout/cart: get: tags: - "Cart" summary: "Get your current cart" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/checkout/cart/line-item: post: tags: - "Cart" summary: "Add a line item to your cart" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] requestBody: content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: items: type: array items: type: object properties: type: default: "product" referencedId: default: "#" quantity: default: "1" responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/payment-method: post: tags: - "Cart" summary: "Loads all available payment methods for your cart" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] requestBody: content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: onlyAvailable: default: "true" associations: type: array responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/checkout/order: post: tags: - "Cart" summary: "Places the order" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/handle-payment: post: tags: - "Cart" summary: "Starts a payment for the previously placed order" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/mollie/creditcard/store-token/{customerId}/{cardToken}: post: tags: - "Credit Card" summary: "Save the card token from Mollie for an upcoming payment in Shopware" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] parameters: - name: "customerId" in: "path" description: "Shopware Customer ID" required: true - name: "cardToken" in: "path" description: "Credit Card Token from the Mollie API Response" required: true responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/mollie/ideal/issuers: get: tags: - "iDEAL" summary: "Gets a list of available iDEAL issuers" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/mollie/ideal/store-issuer/{customerId}/{issuerId}: post: tags: - "iDEAL" summary: "Save the selected issuer for an upcoming payment in Shopware" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] parameters: - name: "customerId" in: "path" description: "Shopware Customer ID" required: true - name: "issuerId" in: "path" description: "Mollie Issuer ID of Mollie, e.g. ideal_ABNANL2A, ..." required: true responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/mollie/applepay/enabled: get: tags: - "Apple Pay Direct" summary: "Gets if Apple Pay Direct is enabled and available for this Sales Channel" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/mollie/applepay/id: get: tags: - "Apple Pay Direct" summary: "Gets the ID of Apple Pay Direct in case you need to hide it" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/mollie/applepay/add-product: post: tags: - "Apple Pay Direct" summary: "(optional) Adds a new product to the Apple Pay Direct cart. Skip this step if you want to proceed with the current Shopware cart of the user" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] requestBody: content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: productId: default: "" quantity: default: 1 responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/mollie/applepay/cart: get: tags: - "Apple Pay Direct" summary: "Gets the current prepared and formatted Apple Pay Direct cart" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/mollie/applepay/validate: post: tags: - "Apple Pay Direct" summary: "Should be used in the Apple Pay form as a merchant validation route" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] requestBody: content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: validationUrl: default: "" responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/mollie/applepay/shipping-methods: post: tags: - "Apple Pay Direct" summary: "Gets a list of available and formatted Apple Pay Direct shipping methods" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] requestBody: content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: countryCode: default: "" responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/mollie/applepay/shipping-method: post: tags: - "Apple Pay Direct" summary: "Sets a provided shipping method for the Apple Pay Direct cart" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] requestBody: content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: identifier: default: "" responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/mollie/applepay/pay: post: tags: - "Apple Pay Direct" summary: "Use this to create an order and start the payment process after getting the Apple Pay payment token and customer data" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] requestBody: content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: email: default: "" firstname: default: "" lastname: default: "" street: default: "" city: default: "" postalCode: default: "" countryCode: default: "" paymentToken: default: "" finishUrl: default: "" errorUrl: default: "" responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/mollie/applepay/restore-cart: post: tags: - "Apple Pay Direct" summary: "(Optional) Restores the original Shopware cart. Use this on Apple Pay cancellation events. You only need this, if you have used the add-product route before." security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/mollie/subscription: get: tags: - "Subscriptions" summary: "Gets all confirmed subscriptions of the current account." security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/mollie/subscription/{subscriptionId}/billing/update: post: tags: - "Subscriptions" summary: "Updates the billing address of a subscription" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] parameters: - in: "path" name: "subscriptionId" description: "ID of the Shopware subscription that will be updated" requestBody: content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: salutationId: default: "" title: default: "" firstName: default: "" lastName: default: "" company: default: "" department: default: "" additionalField1: default: "" additionalField2: default: "" phoneNumber: default: "" street: default: "" zipcode: default: "" city: default: "" responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/mollie/subscription/{subscriptionId}/shipping/update: post: tags: - "Subscriptions" summary: "Updates the shipping address of a subscription" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] parameters: - in: "path" name: "subscriptionId" description: "ID of the Shopware subscription that will be updated" required: true requestBody: content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: salutationId: default: "" title: default: "" firstName: default: "" lastName: default: "" company: default: "" department: default: "" additionalField1: default: "" additionalField2: default: "" phoneNumber: default: "" street: default: "" zipcode: default: "" city: default: "" responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/mollie/subscription/{subscriptionId}/payment/update: post: tags: - "Subscriptions" summary: "Starts the update process of the payment method for a subscription" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] parameters: - in: "path" name: "subscriptionId" description: "ID of the Shopware subscription that will be updated" required: true requestBody: content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: redirectUrl: default: "https://localhost/return-xyz" responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/mollie/subscription/{subscriptionId}/pause: post: tags: - "Subscriptions" summary: "Pauses a running subscription" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] parameters: - in: "path" name: "subscriptionId" description: "ID of the Shopware subscription that will be updated" required: true responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/mollie/subscription/{subscriptionId}/resume: post: tags: - "Subscriptions" summary: "Resumes a paused subscription" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] parameters: - in: "path" name: "subscriptionId" description: "ID of the Shopware subscription that will be updated" required: true responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /store-api/mollie/subscription/{subscriptionId}/skip: post: tags: - "Subscriptions" summary: "Skips a running subscription" security: - AccessKey: [ ] - AccessToken: [ ] parameters: - in: "path" name: "subscriptionId" description: "ID of the Shopware subscription that will be updated" required: true responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /api/mollie/webhook/{transactionId}: post: tags: - "Webhooks" summary: "Sends a payment status update webhook to Shopware" parameters: - in: "path" name: "transactionId" description: "ID of the Shopware Transaction that will be updated" required: true responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /api/mollie/webhook/subscription/{subscriptionId}: post: tags: - "Webhooks" summary: "Start a subscription renewal or update an existing subscription order and payment status." parameters: - in: "path" name: "subscriptionId" description: "ID of the Shopware Subscription" required: true requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: id: type: string description: "The matching transaction ID of Mollie that was captured. tr_xyz, ..." responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /api/mollie/webhook/subscription/{subscriptionId}/mandate/update: post: tags: - "Webhooks" summary: "Updates the mandate for the subscription after an initial update-payment-method action from the customer." parameters: - in: "path" name: "subscriptionId" description: "ID of the Shopware Subscription" required: true requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: id: type: string description: "The matching transaction ID of Mollie that was used with the 0,00 amount payment. tr_xyz, ..." responses: "200": description: "successful operation" /api/mollie/webhook/subscription/{subscriptionId}/renew: post: tags: - "Webhooks (Legacy)" summary: "Start a subscription renewal or update an existing subscription order and payment status. This was a misleading name and is now a legacy URL but still required for old payments." parameters: - in: "path" name: "subscriptionId" description: "ID of the Shopware Subscription" required: true requestBody: content: application/x-www-form-urlencoded: schema: type: object properties: id: type: string description: "The matching transaction ID of Mollie that was captured. tr_xyz, ..." responses: "200": description: "successful operation" components: securitySchemes: AccessKey: type: apiKey in: header name: sw-access-key AccessToken: type: apiKey in: header name: sw-context-token

Error: parse: parse spec: parse path items: path "/api/mollie/webhook/subscription/{subscriptionId}": post: parameters: parse parameter "subscriptionId": at tests/Swagger/mollie-headless.yaml:558:11: parameter MUST contain either a schema property, or a content property
